sentences.sContent: When does the wedding come off [take place]?
sentences.sContent_eng: When does the wedding come off [take place]?

sentences.sContent: How many of you believe that there are meetings that take place without you?
sentences.sContent_eng: How many of you believe that there are meetings that take place without you?
sentences.sCn: 你们中多少人相信会有会议,在你们不在场时也会举行？

sentences.sContent: William and Kate, both 28, have so far revealed only that the wedding will take place in either the spring or summer next year with bookmakers tipping July and August as favorites.
sentences.sContent_eng: William and Kate, both 28, have so far revealed only that the wedding will take place in either the spring or summer next year with bookmakers tipping July and August as favorites.
sentences.sCn: 威廉和凯特今年都是28岁。迄今为止，两人只透露说婚礼将在明年春天或夏天举行。博彩公司认为七月或八月结婚的可能性较大。
